  16. external id : 'a -> 'a = "%identity"
  17. ‌let const c _ = c
  18. ‌let flip f x y = f y x
  19. ‌let negate p v = not (p v)

  21. exception Finally_raised of exn

  23. let () = Printexc.register_printer @@ function
  24. | Finally_raised exn -> Some ("Fun.Finally_raised: " ^ Printexc.to_string exn)
  25. | _ -> None

  27. ‌let protect ~(finally : unit -> unit) work =
  28.   let finally_no_exn () =
  29.     try finally () with e ->
  30.       let bt = Printexc.get_raw_backtrace () in
  31.       Printexc.raise_with_backtrace (Finally_raised e) bt
  32.   in
  33.   match work () with
  34.   | result -> finally_no_exn () ; result
  35.   | exception work_exn ->
  36.       let work_bt = Printexc.get_raw_backtrace () in
  37.       finally_no_exn () ;
  38.       Printexc.raise_with_backtrace work_exn work_bt
